Doing the reading with only the first nine cards is called the Mandala Spread. Adding the four elemental cards is the Alchemical spread
What we actively try to achieve

Pursuits which hold us back from achieving our dreams. For example, many people dream of happiness but pursuit money thinking it will make them happy. However, it is the worry about money, not the lack of it, which actually prevents happiness.
Faults of the querent which need improving
